unnormalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian automotive scene is buzzing with new wheels hitting the streets faster than a Mumbai local!
normalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian automotive scene is buzzing with new wheels hitting the streets faster than a Mumbai local!

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra just dropped their all-new XUV 700 variant, boasting a sunroof bigger than my chacha's balcony. Expect a rush to dealerships faster than you can say "Kitna deti hai?".
normalised: First up, Mahindra just dropped their all-new X U V seven hundred variant, boasting a sunroof bigger than my chacha's balcony. Expect a rush to dealerships faster than you can say "Kitna deti hai?".

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors unveiled its sleek new electric SUV near Pune, aiming to electrify your Diwali commutes. Dr. Sharma from ARAI gave it his thumbs up, saying it's a game-changer.
normalised: Then, Tata Motors unveiled its sleek new electric S U V near Pune, aiming to electrify your Diwali commutes. Doctor Sharma from A R A I gave it his thumbs up, saying it's a game-changer.

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki announced the launch of a limited edition Baleno, decked out with more chrome than a Bollywood wedding. Rs. 8.5 Lakhs starting price, they're saying.
normalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki announced the launch of a limited edition Baleno, decked out with more chrome than a Bollywood wedding. Rupee eight point five lakhs starting price, they're saying.

unnormalised: And hold on, folks! A brand new Royal Enfield Himalayan is rumoured to be launching soon, perfect for conquering those Ladakh roads. It's supposed to have a better seat and suspension, covering 400 km with ease.
normalised: And hold on, folks! A brand new Royal Enfield Himalayan is rumoured to be launching soon, perfect for conquering those Ladakh roads. It's supposed to have a better seat and suspension, covering four hundred kilometer with ease.

unnormalised: Rumor has it that the interior will boast a revamped instrument console spreading across 20 sq ft. Whoa!
normalised: Rumor has it that the interior will boast a revamped instrument console spreading across twenty square feet. Whoa!

unnormalised: Looks like our wallets are about to get a serious workout. Happy driving, and remember, *gaadi dhyan se chalana!* (Drive carefully!)
normalised: Looks like our wallets are about to get a serious workout. Happy driving, and remember, *gaadi dhyan se chalana!* (Drive carefully!)
